comment: Smart Data Models - ExcST3A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcST3A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST3A static excitation system with added speed multiplier.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efdmax
contents.comment: Maximum AVR output (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 6.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Kg).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 4.83. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kj
contents.comment: AVR gain (Kj).  Typical Value = 200. Default: 0.0

contents.name: km
contents.comment: Forward gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Km).  Typical Value = 7.04. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential source gain (Kp) (>0).  Typical Value = 4.37. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks1
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 6.67. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: thetap
contents.comment: Potential circuit phase angle (thetap).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: tm
contents.comment: Forward time constant of inner loop field regulator (Tm).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: vbmax
contents.comment: Maximum excitation voltage (Vbmax).  Typical Value = 8.63. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vgmax
contents.comment: Maximum inner loop feedback voltage (Vgmax).  Typical Value = 6.53. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator input limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator input limit (Vimin).  Typical Value = -0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xl
contents.comment: Reactance associated with potential source (Xl).  Typical Value = 0.09. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
